events.name: hackPHX - Arduino Hackathon
events.about:
Your Arduino toolkit and skills. Our secret ingredient. The hackerspaces resources. A small budget for additional stuff. After 12 hours of hacking a winner will arise, but every team is going home with hardware! Seats Limited. FREE.

Please choose a ticket based on your experience.

  • Arduino Rookie (you dabble with arduino)
  • Arduino Rookie + hackerspace skills (2d, 3d design, laser cutter, woodworking, welding, etc) 
  • Arduino Veteran ( You know how to install libraries and maybe even make your own-- or maybe you go bare metal Atmel C code?)

Well meet friday night @heatsynclabs, unveil the secret ingredient, find teams, and start planning your attack as long as the beer and coffee flows.

Saturday morning at 10am we reconvene @heatsynclabs and youll be given your hardware and let loose for 12 hours of hacking! Your team can run to Radioshack, Walmart, Frys, etc, for extra supplies within budget, or just use the hackerspaces resources. Or you can break all the rules and see if you can get the Jury prize from your peers!

More info at @ http://www.hackphx.com/arduino_winter2012/

This is all made possible by Microchip, Make, SeeedStudio, Elenco, Parrallax, Schmartboard, Iced Dev, HeatSync Labs so please show them your love and support.
